text: The Hebrews (Hebrew: עברים or עבריים) is an ancient Semitic people of Middle East. They are ancestors of Israelites, son of Isaac and Arabs son of Ishmael and descend from Shem, son of Noah and cousin as the descendants of Japheth and the descendants of Ham. Hebrew Bible, Table of Nations (Book of Genesis, 10) They escape from Ancient Egypt is recounted in Torah in book called Exodus in English, or שמות in Hebrew. == References == ==Related pages== *Abraham *Semitic people *Abrahamic religions == Other websites == *Hebrews. title: Hebrew people
